item.title: Steph add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Steph add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Steph add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "ASAP. Whatever that means. It must mean, 'Act swiftly awesome pacyderm!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Just tell yourself, Duckie, you're real quite lucky." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Be awesome! Be a book nut!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "And what would you do if you met a jibboo?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steph add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Steph add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steph add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steph add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steph add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Shit is the tofu of cursing and can be molded to whichever condition the speaker desires. Hot as shit. Windy as shit. I myself was confounded as shit..." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "This left me alone to solve the coffee problem - a sort of catch-22, as in order to think straight I need caffeine, and in order to make that happen I need to think straight." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I just looked at the pattern of my life, decided I didn't like it, and changed." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "You can't brace yourself for famine if you've never known hunger." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "When asked "What do we need to learn this for?" any high-school teacher can confidently answer that, regardless of the subject, the knowledge will come in handy once the student hits middle age and starts working crossword puzzles in order to stave off the terrible loneliness." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Steph add a quote by David Sedaris
